featured.text: At the end of the class, you __(25)__ with you classmates the meals you have created, and you will leave with recipe handouts and , more importantly, the ability to cook two weeks of fantastic, low-cost meals.
Within a few years, Chinese restaurant owners in San Francisco had copied the recipe and 40 the thank-you notes with fortune notes.
The recipe for a breakfast food.
The fortune cookie was based on a Japanese snack, but Hagiwara sweetened the recipe to appeal to American 39 .
The Moon Lake Restaurant’s menu included French-fried potatoes, a popular food recipe brought back from France by Thomas Jefferson.

definition.zh_def: 食譜；烹飪方法的詳細說明。
definition.en_def: A set of instructions for preparing a particular dish, including a list of the ingredients required.
definition.example: I found a delicious recipe for chocolate cake online.
